Component.name: RoundedBox
Component.Description: Defines the dimensions of a box shape with rounded edges by the relative offset of two opposite corners and a Vector3 of radii to modify the roundedness of the edges

Vector3Attribute.name: min
Vector3Attribute.description: The relative offset of the bottom corner (furthest in the -x, -y, -z direction) of the box from\nthe center

Vector3Attribute.name: max
Vector3Attribute.description: The relative offset of the top corner (furthest in the +x, +y, +z direction) of the box from\nthe center

Vector3Attribute.name: radius
Vector3Attribute.description: The radii of the rounded edges of the box, where the radii corresponds to the edges along that\nplane. (i.e radius.x corresponds to the edges running along in the x axis)
